Package ca.hexanome04.splendorgame.model

Class DevelopmentCard

java.lang.Object
ca.hexanome04.splendorgame.model.Card
ca.hexanome04.splendorgame.model.DevelopmentCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
OrientDevelopmentCard, RegDevelopmentCard
public abstract class DevelopmentCard extends Card
Abstract class that represents a development card.

  • Constructor Details

    • DevelopmentCard

      public DevelopmentCard(CardTier cardTier, TokenType tokenType, int bonus, int prestigePoints, CostType costType, HashMap<TokenType,Integer> tokenCost, String id)
      Creates a development card from the class in which this was called super from.
      Parameters:
      tokenType - The type of token associated to this development card.
      bonus - The integer token bonus associated to this development card.
      prestigePoints - Amount of prestige points associated to this card.
      costType - Cost type associated to this card.
      tokenCost - Token cost associated to this card.
      id - ID associated to this card.
      cardTier - Tier of the development card (e.g. 1, 2, or 3).

  • Method Details

      public TokenType getTokenType()
      Returns the type of bonus associated with this card.
      Returns:
      The type of token.

    • setTokenType

      public void setTokenType(TokenType tokenType)
      Sets the token type of this card, but only if it's of type satchel to begin with.
      Parameters:
      tokenType - The type of token to be assigned to this card.

    • getBonus

      public int getBonus()
      Gets the number of bonuses associated to this card.
      Returns:
